resources.string: File: %s is not a valid audio file.

Please insert a number for the days to backup.

You must spend at least %s second(s) on this question.

Sorry, Barcode Scanner is not installed!
This form cannot be edited once it has been marked as complete. It may be encrypted.
Mark form as finalized by default
Remove group \"%s\" and all of its sub-groups?
Access Denied. Press your back button to exit.
Collect v%s is available on your server.
There is a newer version of Collect available on your server. You should download and update this device to Collect v%s from Admin Settings.
This device is currently running Collect v%1$s, but there is a newer version available on your server. Tap here to download Collect v%2$s and update this device whenever possible.
After it has downloaded, tap to install the update.
This submission has already been finalized. Are you sure that you want to edit it?
Collect is currently downloading form updates. Please try again in a couple of minutes.
Install update for this form first?
Could not launch the updated form!
All form packages were installed successfully.
Some form packages failed to install.
No cases are installed on this device. Click Refresh below to download cases.
No cases were found using this filter: %s
Cannot show cases. Please enter the username in General Settings.
Server does not have a dataset with ID \'%s\'.
I\'m sorry, but you don\'t have access to download the cases list.
Cannot download cases: the server responded with error code %d.
The cases dataset does not contain required column \'%s\'.
I\'m sorry but Collect can\'t handle the selected file.
An error occurred while attaching the media: %s
Sorry, %1$s of %2$s selected form(s) failed to delete!
Sorry, a form delete action is already in progress!
Sorry, you have not selected any forms!
Nothing available to display.\n\nTry getting and filling out a blank form.
Nothing available to display.\n\nTry finalizing saved forms before sending.
The server has not provided an available-forms document compatible with Aggregate 0.9.x. : %s
The server has not provided an available-forms document compatible with the OpenRosa version 1.0 standard: %s
Please wait. This could take a few minutes.
Please select one of the following restore points:
Add a comment on this field
You are at the end of %s.
Could not confirm submission received (safest to retry)
Please enter username and password for server:\n%s
You must first enable the auto-backup option in Settings.
\"%s` is not a valid number of days.
The form was saved but there was an error backing it up to the internal storage. Reason: %s
Could not encrypt finalized submission! Error: %s
You may need to make more space on your internal storage or change the General Settings option to back up fewer days.
Could not clear old backups. Reason: %s
The form was backed up successfully!
The form metadata could not be found to be backed up.
Please enter your server name in the Server field.
Please enter only your server name in the Server field. This is the URL prefix that you use when accessing the SurveyCTO server, as in the \"servername\" in servername.surveycto.com.
This will restore %s filled-out form(s) from internal storage. Are you sure?
There are no forms in the internal storage backup.
The number of forms could not be determined. Reason: %s
Manifest reply does not report an OpenRosa version — bad server?
Manifest entry %s is missing one or more tags: filename, hash, or downloadUrl
XForm parse error. %1$s is missing element %2$s
Saved name must not be blank!
\'Added on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
\'Saved on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
\'Finalized on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
\'Sent on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
\'Sending failed on\' EEE, MMM dd, yyyy \'at\' HH:mm
Unable to edit this saved form because the corresponding blank form is not present or was deleted.\n\nForm ID: %1$s
The requested application is missing. Please manually enter the reading.
Set a password to protect the Admin Settings
Require a passcode to open Collect
User can access Main Menu items:
User can access General Settings items:
Tap for admin access to settings
User can access Form Entry items:
Sorry, app passcodes do not match!
Sorry, app passcode should have at least %s digits.
Please enter the app passcode to open Collect
Sorry, you entered too many failed attempts. Please wait %s minutes and then try again.
In order to reset your app passcode, please ask the server administrator of %s.surveycto.com to enable passcode reset on the server, then click the button below.
Sorry, you are not allowed to reset your passcode. Please talk to your server administrator, and try again.
Sorry, Collect is having trouble connecting to your server. Please check your connection and try again.
Warning: if you forget this passcode, it can only be reset if your server name is correct. Please verify that your server name is correct: %s.
Uncheck to hide from menu in Form Entry
Show form send/receive status on main menu
Form updates check completed with errors.
Check your configured server name, it doesn\'t appear to be a valid one.
set for wi-fi and mobile data

Auto send when Wi-Fi is available
Auto send when network is available

Auto download form updates when network is available
Check for updates when opening case list or blank form
Auto install any updates that have been downloaded
Uncheck to hide from Main Menu
Uncheck to hide from General Settings
Uncheck to hide from end of Form Entry
You are at the start of %s. Swipe the screen as shown below to go backward and forward.
You are at the start of %s. Tap the arrow buttons below to go backward and forward.
You are at the start of %s. Swipe the screen as shown below or tap the arrow buttons to go backward and forward.
Form not complete. Correct now, or save and exit anyway?
The requested printer is not installed. Please install the printer.
SurveyCTO cannot access the SD card. Perhaps it is mounted via USB?
Cannot load the external data because there are some columns that cannot be uniquely identified: %s. Please use more english letters for those fields and try again.
Your sortby column should contain only numeric values. Conflicting value was \'%s\'.
"Syntax error in search() function: The function needs 1, 4 or 6 arguments."
Syntax error in search() function : Unrecognised function \'%s\'.
Syntax error in search() function: \'%s\' was not evaluated as a function.
The search handler returned a object of type \'%s\'.
Could not import data from %1$s. Reason: %2$s
The ExternalDataManager has not been initialized.
External data for %1$s has not been imported. Perhaps you forgot to include the %2$s.csv file with your form?
Internal error: step to prompt failed.
The image chooser app did not returned an image.

You have downloaded two different forms with the same form ID and version. Maybe they were the same form uploaded at different times or to different servers. In any case, you should delete one before continuing.
Only questions are allowed in \'field-list\'. Bad node is: %s
Could not delete \'%s\'. Please delete the file manually and re-download the form.
Could not create media folder \'%s\'. Please try again.
Collect reports: \'%s\' exists, but is not a directory.
Reading form definition…\nThis might take longer but only for this time.
there is a very long expression in the form
Content type \'%1$s\' returned from %2$s is not text/xml. This is often caused by a network proxy. Do you need to login to your network?
Unexpected redirection attempt to a different host: %s
Invalid status code on Head request. If you have a web proxy, you may need to login to your network.
Instance XML file does not exist!
Submission data are over %sMB. This submission can\'t send to the server, but it could be sent via local wi-fi sync.
Submission includes files over %1$sMB. Those files can\'t send to the server, but they could be sent via local wi-fi sync (Offending files: %2$s).
This will discard any new data that you have entered. Are you sure?
Settings were successfully written to file: %s.
The crash report has been submitted successfully!
You cannot connect to a server because you have not yet configured your server name and login. Press OK to configure your settings now.
I\'m sorry, but you don\'t have access to download the forms list.
Form or form list not found on server. Check your configured server name. Also, if submitting data, ensure that the form still exists on the server.
Sorry, the settings could not be applied. Please select \"Submit Crash Report\" via the Admin Settings.
Maximum pixels for the long edge of the image
Shorten repeat groups in go-to UI
SurveyCTO Collect is currently running from your device\'s SD card. Performance and stability will be better if you move it to your device\'s internal memory (in the Android application settings).
Connect to computer via local wi-fi?
Finalized forms will be sent automatically.
Scanning for SurveyCTO Sync running device sync...
Connected to computer: you can now send and receive forms.
Connected via local wi-fi (%s). Click here to disconnect.
Sorry, can’t find SurveyCTO Sync running device sync.

Please finalize or delete submissions begun with these form versions before deleting them:

%1$s

Submissions not yet finalized: %2$s.
Allow resume from where left off
Show list of all form fields
Sorry, this form doesn\'t have a saved position from which to resume.
The last saved position could not match a place in the survey: %s
Cannot resume from the last saved position: %s
Please install Google Play Services in order to better capture GPS locations. Until you do, your device might be slow to capture accurate locations.
Please update Google Play Services in order to better capture GPS locations. Until you do, your device might be slow to capture accurate locations.
Please enable Google Play Services in order to better capture GPS locations. Until you do, your device might be slow to capture accurate locations.
There is a problem with the installation of the Google Play services (error code: %s). Until you fix it, your device might be slow to capture accurate locations.
Your Android version on this device doesn\'t support viewing application settings.
Auto-accept locations with accuracy better or equal to %s
Unable to access Google Maps. Is Google Play Services installed?
Attempt to record both sides of a phone conversation when possible.
To store offline map tiles on this device, create subdirectory under /Android/data/com.surveycto.collect.android/files/config/layers and copy .mbtiles files into it.
No .mbtiles file found in the directory \'%s\'.
"GPS is disabled in your device. Would you like to enable it?"
GPS is disabled in your device. Would you like to enable it?
Feature already created. Would you like to clear the feature?
Discard changes and return to ODK?
Must have at least 3 points to create Polygon
Long press on marks to move them.
Wait for lock, then tap add marker button to start.
Long press to place mark or tap add marker button.
SurveyCTO Collect is part of SurveyCTO, a technology platform for high-quality data collection produced and supported by Dobility, Inc.\n\nClick to learn more at www.surveycto.com.

Copyright (c) %s Dobility, Inc. All rights reserved.
Portions Copyright (C) 2010-17 University of Washington.

Click to learn about open-source libraries and other copyright holders.
Selected offline layer file uses the PBF format which is not supported!
The specified date is invalid for your timezone, probably because of the DST settings. Please turn forward one hour and try again (Details: %s).
I\'m sorry, but this SurveyCTO server only supports Android devices running version 4.1 or higher.
The configured submission_url is not a valid URL: %s
Would you like to configure the app to connect to an existing server, or use our demo settings?

SurveyCTO Collect requires a few permissions to be granted but you have suppressed the dialogs to grant them via the app, so you will need to visit the Application Settings to grant those permissions manually.
SurveyCTO Collect will not be able to work without access to your device. This access will only be used for data collection explicitly requested by your forms. Please allow access to continue.
Allows read only access to phone state, including the phone identifiers and current cellular network information
Allows the app to make phone calls.
Allows the app to access precise location (GPS and network-based)
Allows the app to access approximate location (network-based)
Allows the app to modify or delete the contents of your SD card
Allows the app to read the contents of your SD card
Allows the app to record audio

Are you sure that you want to reload this submission with the latest version of the form available on this device?\n\nIf fields have been deleted, renamed, or relocated in the new version of the form, data you already entered into those fields may be lost.
No updated version of the form has been installed on this device.

Notifications have been disabled for SurveyCTO Collect. You will not be able to see constraint messages while filling out a form. Click this note to go to the application settings if you want to enable notifications.

This form was just updated.
A new version of this form was installed %1$s. You are now filling out version %2$s.
SurveyCTO Collect %s now uses a more secure way to store your forms and data on this device. You will need to migrate your existing forms and data to this new location before you can proceed.

Warning: it looks like there is not enough free space to migrate to the private storage option.

Available space in internal storage: %1$s
Required space in internal storage: %2$s

Warning: it looks like there is not enough free space to migrate to the public storage option.

Available space in external storage: %1$s
Required space in external storage: %2$s

Having trouble?
You may want to try other options since the migration to the private storage failed before.
Warning: we\'re having trouble accessing storage on this device. Most likely, this is due to available disk space. We recommend clearing up some space on your device, then returning to this screen.
How do I clear up space?

The easiest way to clear up space is usually to delete videos and photos, since they are large files. If you have any unused apps, those can be quite large as well.

Some devices have separate external storage on a removable SD card. If you are trying to free up space in external storage, delete files from your SD card.

If you are trying to free up space in internal storage, try deleting apps.

Warning! After this migration, when you uninstall SurveyCTO Collect, all forms and data will be deleted as well. Please do not uninstall Collect until you are sure you no longer need the data that’s on this device.
Your forms and data are being migrated. Please wait…

Sorry, there was an error while migrating your forms and data:

%s

Before trying again, please revert all the changes.
Please wait while we revert all changes.
Sorry, there was an error while rolling back the previous migration attempt: %s. Please try again.

Sorry, there is not enough free space in the public storage on this device to rollback the previous changes. You currently have %1$s available free space, but you need at least %2$s free space. Please clear some space by deleting any unnecessary files (like photos and videos) and try again.
All data has been successfully migrated.
We found new settings to apply.
This will require that we first migrate your Collect data to the %s.
There was an error attempting to apply your new settings. Do you want to try again?
You settings have been successfully sent to your server.
Sorry, please check your server login credentials in General Settings and try again.
Sorry, your server is not currently able to receive your settings. Please first click \"Receive settings from Collect\" for this user role in your server console.
Cannot reach server: Sorry, we can\'t reach your server. Please check your connection and try again.
Please enter your SurveyCTO server login information, then click \"Run quick setup\".
Warning, this process may involve downloading large amounts of data. Please make sure you are on a suitable network connection.
Please enter your server name, username, and password first.
Sorry, please check your server login credentials and try again.
Sorry, we’re having trouble connecting to that server. Please check the server name, then check your connection and try again.
Your server login settings have been saved. There were no other default settings available on your server. Try clicking \'Get Blank Form\' to get new forms.
Default device settings have been applied.

Sorry, the link you just followed is attempting to change settings that have been hidden by Admin Settings. Please check your Admin Settings and try again, or try running quick setup manually from General Settings.
Collect is now set as the default phone app.
Click here to revert back to your normal phone app.

According to your Collect Admin Settings, you need to change your default phone app to continue. Please click OK and then select SurveyCTO Collect as your default phone app.\n\nIf clicking OK does not work, click here to go to Android settings, then manually set your default phone app to SurveyCTO Collect from there.

According to your Collect Admin Settings, you need to change your default phone app to continue. Please click OK and then select SurveyCTO Collect as your default phone app. You will be prompted to revert this change when you close Collect.\n\nIf clicking OK does not work, click here to go to Android settings, then manually set your default phone app to SurveyCTO Collect from there.

According to your Collect Admin Settings, you need to change your default phone app to continue. Please click OK and then select SurveyCTO Collect as your default phone app. You will be prompted to revert this change when you close Collect. You can also revert manually at any time.\n\nIf clicking OK does not work, click here to go to Android settings, then manually set your default phone app to SurveyCTO Collect from there.
According to your Collect Admin Settings, SurveyCTO Collect should never be the default phone app on this device. Please update your Admin settings first.
According to your Collect Admin Settings, SurveyCTO Collect should always be the default phone app on this device. Please either leave Collect as the default phone app or update your Admin settings.

According to your <CAS>Collect Admin Settings</CAS>, it is now time to revert back to using your normal phone app to make and receive calls. Please click OK and then select your normal phone app.\n\nIf clicking OK does not work, <AS>click here to go to Android settings</AS>, then you can manually revert your default phone app to your normal phone app from there.

According to your Collect Admin Settings, SurveyCTO Collect should never be your default phone app. Please click OK and then select a different default phone app.\n\nIf clicking OK does not work, click here to go to Android settings, then you can manually change your default phone app to something other than SurveyCTO Collect from there.
I\'m sorry but Collect is configured to never act as a phone dialer. You may want to change this via the <CAS>Admin Settings</CAS> and try your last action again.

I\'m sorry but this call must be made within SurveyCTO Collect. In your <CAS>Admin Settings</CAS>, please change your \"set as default phone app\" setting to something other than \"never\" and try again.
If you would like to make this phone call in Collect, you\'ll need to set Collect as the default phone app.
Set Collect as default phone app
Try with a different phone app
Collect can only act as the default phone app on devices running Android 6.0 or higher.

Choose which app should make and receive phone calls.\n\nIf clicking the button below doesn\'t work, <AS>click here to go to Android settings</AS>, then manually set your default phone app from there.

Would you like to revert back to your normal default phone app?\n\nIf clicking the button below doesn\'t work, <AS>click here to go to Android settings</AS>, then manually set your default phone app from there.
This feature is not supported by your device.
There is already the maximum number of calls in progress. Do you want to end the current call and make a new one?
End current call and make new call
Place current call on hold and make new call
Answer and end call on hold
